document.full_text: officials suggest that people living from 12 to 19 miles outside the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant should leave, as new signs emerged that it will be hard to bring the plant under control.
document.title: japan encourages a wider evacuation from reactor area
lines_and_colors: officials suggest that people living from 12 to 19 miles outside the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant should leave, as new signs emerged that it will be hard to bring the plant under control.
